import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Find ticket assets by model/category"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/assets"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns ticket asset links for the specified asset models or categories. Use this to see which tickets already reference a device model (or its category) before attaching new assets or issuing bulk updates.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ModelIds/CategoryIds** – Query the catalog via [POST /api/v1.0/issues/for/models](/docs/api/model-issues/get-issues-for-models) and capture `Items[].ModelId` plus `Items[].Category.CategoryId`. Optionally confirm the selection with [GET /api/v1.0/issues/for/models/\{modelId\}](/docs/api/model-issues/get-issues-for-model).
2. **Product scope (optional)** – Reuse the `ProductId` header from your session or retrieve a product context from [POST /api/v1.0/assets/](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) (`Items[].ProductId`) when searching across products.
3. **Asset context (optional)** – When reconciling against a specific device, load it with [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id) to pull `AssetId`, `ModelId`, and `CategoryId` for the payload.

**Workflow Example**
1. Discover models: [POST /api/v1.0/issues/for/models](/docs/api/model-issues/get-issues-for-models) with asset type filters → record `ModelId` and `CategoryId` for the devices you want to audit.
2. Build payload: include `ModelIds` (or `CategoryIds`), keep `FilterByProduct: true` to limit to the active product, and supply `ProductId` only when overriding the header context.
3. Call [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/assets](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-assets-by-model) → inspect returned `TicketAssetId`/`AssetId` pairs for tickets using those models.
4. (Optional) Use the results to drive follow-up updates with [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/assets](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-assets) when adding or pruning links on individual tickets.

**Minimal Required Fields**: at least one of `ModelIds` or `CategoryIds`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Model and/or category filters that determine which ticket asset links are returned. When `FilterByProduct` is true, results are limited to the product specified in the request headers unless `ProductId` is provided.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Filters used to retrieve ticket asset links for specific models or categories. Provide at least one of `ModelIds` or `CategoryIds`; when both arrays are empty the service returns an empty collection.","properties":{"ModelIds":{"type":"array","description":"One or more asset model identifiers to match when returning ticket assets.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset model identifier obtained from the model catalog."},"minItems":1,"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getIssuesForModels","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/models","responseField":"Items[].ModelId"}},"ModelId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Shortcut for a single model identifier. When set, this value is inserted as the first entry in `ModelIds`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getIssuesForModels","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/models","responseField":"Items[].ModelId"}},"CategoryIds":{"type":"array","description":"Category identifiers used to find ticket assets tied to any model within the specified categories.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset category identifier returned with model metadata."},"minItems":1,"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getIssuesForModels","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/models","responseField":"Items[].Category.CategoryId"}},"CategoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Shortcut for a single category identifier. When provided, this value populates the first element of `CategoryIds`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getIssuesForModels","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/models","responseField":"Items[].Category.CategoryId"}},"FilterByProduct":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, limits results to ticket assets whose tickets belong to the current product context. Set to `false` to search across all products for the site.","default":true},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Overrides the product scope when `FilterByProduct` is true. If omitted, the ProductId header for the current request is used.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchAssets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/assets/","responseField":"Items[].ProductId"}},"IncludeDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Include ticket asset links marked as deleted. Defaults to false so only active links are returned.","default":false}},"anyOf":[{"required":["ModelIds"]},{"required":["CategoryIds"]}],"example":{"ModelIds":["8b7f9421-1b0a-4dd4-d7c7-498f1954f69a"],"CategoryIds":["36c6be98-4f39-e611-bf3b-005056bb000e"],"FilterByProduct":true,"ProductId":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","IncludeDeleted":false},"title":"GetTicketAssetsRequest"},"example":{"ModelIds":["8b7f9421-1b0a-4dd4-d7c7-498f1954f69a"],"CategoryIds":["36c6be98-4f39-e611-bf3b-005056bb000e"],"FilterByProduct":true}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
